bug.author: lvybriage
bug.summary: Fix bugs of table entries and hyper-parameter graph
bug.description:
Short summary about the issue/question: I met some questions in webui.
When I select "all" in detail page's table and table message update, table is paging again. when only one succeed trial in hyper-parameter graph: ). color bar max value is 190 rather than its final result value ). when I select top "80%", the graph is null. table search isn't case-insensitive
Brief what process you are following: -- How to reproduce it: -- nni Environment: Linux
nni version: v0.7 nni mode(local|pai|remote): local OS: -- python version: -- is conda or virtualenv used?: -- is running in docker?: no
need to update document(yes/no): no Anything else we need to know: --
